channel.title: LED on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in LED on Pi4J

item.title: Minimal Example
item.description: Minimal Pi4J with JBang example GITHUB PROJECT: https://github.com/Pi4J/pi4j-jbang Pi4JMinimalExample.java Intro Before proceeding with this example, make sure that you have a Raspberry Pi prepared to execute Java code with JBang as explained here. The following example is based on the “Minimal example application”, and uses the same wiring with a button and LED. By using JBang we can run this project with a single file without the need of a full Maven or Gradle project, or compiling the Java code.
